inclusion.criterion: Fabry Registry: All patients with a confirmed diagnosis of Fabry disease who have signed the informed consent and patient authorization form(s) are eligible for leukocyte αGAL (alpha-galactosidase) enzyme activity and/or mutation(s) in the gene coding for αGAL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fabry Pregnancy Sub-registry: Eligible women must be enrolled in the Fabry Registry. be pregnant, or have been pregnant with appropriate medical documentation available. provide a signed informed consent and authorization form(s) to participate in the Sub-Registry prior to any Sub-Registry-related data collection being performed.
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has history of acne, mild hirsutism, and elevated testosterone levels. She also has positive history for snoring and headache.
